home.description: Discover and watch your favorite series and documentaries from various sources in one place.
home.searchPlaceholder: Search for movies, series and documentaries...
home.noContinueWatching: You haven't started watching any series yet. Start exploring and enjoy your favorite shows!
home.noFavorites: You haven't added any series to your favorites yet. Browse and add your favorite shows to keep them handy!

sync.key_copied_description: The sync key has been copied to your clipboard.
sync.settings_description: Manage device synchronization and data sharing
sync.status_description: Current synchronization state and connection status
sync.data_collections_description: Choose which data to synchronize across devices
sync.connected_devices_description: Devices currently synchronized with this account
sync.add_new_relay_description: Enter the WebSocket URL of the Nostr relay you want to add. The URL should start with wss:// or ws://
sync.invalid_websocket_url: Please enter a valid WebSocket URL (wss:// or ws://)
sync.no_relays_configured: No relays configured. Add a relay to start synchronizing data.
sync.relay_configuration_note_description: Changes to relay configuration will take effect the next time sync is restarted. Some relays may have rate limits or require authentication.
sync.title: Sync Your Devices
sync.description: Scan the QR code with your other device to establish a secure peer-to-peer connection
sync.import_mnemonic_key_description: Paste your existing mnemonic key to sync with your other devices
sync.scan_qr_code_description: This code expires in 5 minutes for security
sync.works_with_devices: Works with phones, tablets, and computers
sync.trouble_connecting: Having trouble? Make sure both devices are connected to the internet and the app is updated to the latest version.

search.placeholder: Search for movies, series and documentaries...

providers.title: Sources
providers.description: You can watch the series using the sources below, just click on any of them.

favorites.removeError: Error occurred while removing from favorites
favorites.addError: Error occurred while adding to favorites

waitPeers.pleaseWait: Please wait while connecting to the room
waitPeers.mayTakeTime: This may take some time, please don't close the window.

language.description: Choose your preferred language for the application

experimental.title: Experimental Features
experimental.description: Try out new features before they're fully released

warning.title: Experimental Features Warning
warning.description: These features are experimental and may be unstable, incomplete, or subject to change. Use them at your own risk and expect potential issues.

error.nativeOnly: This feature is only available in the desktop application.

info.title: About Experimental Features
info.description: Experimental features help us test new functionality with early adopters. Your feedback is valuable in shaping these features before their full release.

sync.name: Device Sync
sync.warning: This feature is experimental and may be unstable. Use with caution.
sync.description: Synchronize your data across multiple devices using P2P or Nostr protocols

watchTogether.name: Watch Together
watchTogether.warning: This feature is experimental and may be unstable. Use with caution.
watchTogether.description: Watch videos together with friends in real-time

subtitles.name: Subtitle Search
subtitles.warning: This feature is experimental and may be unstable. Use with caution.
subtitles.description: Automatically search and download subtitles for your videos
